review_text: Bad packing, box damaged when I received it. I don't understand why they have 3 bar codes and only one was read by the machine.The whey pounder has some white color material in it.The packing and the seal was not proper and it is safe to say that I was damaged.Not sure if Amazon is selling original ON products. review_text: If you visit Optimum Nutrition official website to check the genuineness of their product, there are several tests that they recommend. And the product which I received didn't passed those tests.1. There is absolutely no seal, which is completely is contrast to what the website said. Product is readily available to rotate the cap anticlockwise and use. It's just like every other home container.2. The hologram is sticker on above the cap. Not in proper place.3. Container's bottom is not matching the description that's stated on official website.I've performed these tests only on packaging and container and it looks fake that way. However, I haven't used any sort of protein before so I'm clueless how to test the actual product.N.B.: I'm only doubting the genuineness of this product by looking at the packaging because it doesn't match the one described on the official website. review_text: First of all I'm a big fan of Optimum Nutrition. I'm using their products since 2014.Attached screenshots are comparison of their old formula and new formula. You guys can see the difference.I had weight lifting gap be for few years due to my career. I recently started lifting again. I just bought this product and it gave me digestive issues the next day.Then I checked the formula and compared it with my old boxes and find out they have completely removed the digestive enzymes. It'll be difficult for lactose intolerant people.They have removed aminogen (patened enzyme) and lactase from their formula. Due to this many people could have digestive issues such as gas, bloating, gut irritability etc. especially for ibs people.Tip:- take it with banana and fiber you'll feel better.

review_text: The quality of Indian products doesn‚Äôt really match the quality of imported units. review_text: I got this flavor after reading a lot positive comments about it. Though it turned out to be a disappointment to me. It felt so bad that I thought of throwing it out.A few days, I decided to read the instruction in the jar and it said you need to mix it with 180-240ml water. That's where I was wrong. I was mixing it with 150-180ml water(perfect quantity for Double Rich Chocolate).Those who are disliking it's flavor can try this - 250ml water + 5-6 ice cubes. It will drastically reduce down the sweetness and make it far more tolerable.No issues with the whey quality but I'm never buying this flavor again!

review_text: Before I say anything, know this. Food and Grocery safety in India is pure joke. There are no proper safety recommendations. review_text: I WILL GIVE THE FULL REVIEW POINT BY POINT (with attached Photos). ENJOY AND KEEP READING, YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED.Just to clarify and to be honest, this is the first time I'm using a Whey protein, not just the brand but Whey protein itself. Though, I was very skeptical about the purchase after reading so many reviews about the product being fake, I still decided to order it.ABOUT THE JAR/TUB (AUTHENTICITY CHECK from the outside): There was a strong chocolate smell on the outside of the jar already. I checked the bottom of the jar and the tub looked normal. Mfd and Exp date had exactly 2 years gap. I did not find any tampering marks whatsoever.There was the "ON Authentic seal" on the neck band. I checked everything thoroughly before opening it. The QR code on the jar itself led me to product page of Optimum Nutrition website.The QR code on the importer sticker led me to Bright Commodities authenticity checking page. I scratched the Importer sticker for the hidden code and entered all the details and it said that the product is authentic.After opening the jar, I did find the seal attached on the lid.The jar was kind of half filled, not up to the brim. (Doubt 1)I also found the golden scoop with the branding on it and Made in USA written inside the scoop along with some other details.SMELL, CONSISTENCY AND TEXTURE OF THE POWDER: The power smelled nice and the texture was normal I think (First time user), not clumpy or anything.No stickiness at all, the powder did not stick to the inside of the jar. (Authenticity checking method found somewhere online)One thing that I noticed was that, the powder had some white particles in it. (Doubt 2)Now, to clear out my doubts I called 011-49594959 which was Glanbia Performance Nutrition. I followed the instructions given by the IVR and asked about my doubts. The customer executive was helpful enough and told that "The product is 100% authentic. The jar is supposed to be filled half way and the white particles are 'Amino Acids'."I was satisfied with all the authenticity checking and all.TASTE: Though it smelled really chocolaty, the taste was just okay. According to me, it had a medicinal taste to it.Consistency was okay, not thick at all, it might just be the amount of water I added. (1 full scoop in one glass of water)MIXABILITY: It mixed with the water fairly easily. Found 1 tiny lump, and by "tiny" I really mean tiny, most of the people won't even notice it probably. I noticed it because I was trying to find lumps intentionally. Now, keep in mind that I did not use a shaker, it was simply stirred with a spoon in a glass. I did not even stir vigorously. So, mixability is good I think.RATING: Now, talking about the rating, I gave it a 4* just because the taste was okay.
flavour_name: Flavour Name: Double Rich ChocolateSize: 2 Lbs

review_text: following is the list of checks i did for the protein powder's genuinity:. ON branded logo on top of the lid.. duration between manufacture and expiry date is exact 2 years. label on bottom of the jar printed in blue.. mixing consistency of the powder is fast with little to no lumps forming after the mix.. made in usa or made in india printed on the scoop.. qr code or 6 digit code on the sticker is verifiable at ON's official site. (most important check). no damages to the tub, lid or the label on the tub.. no spelling mistakes anywhere on the label.. genuine imported label present on the tub along with date of manufacture and expiry (matching with the dates on the bottom of the tub printed in blue), importers address and contact details.. finally, check importer's name in the list of genuine importers on ON's official site.

review_text: So this was my 1st time ordering a protein supplement online and as per others i was also apprehensive about the genuineness. The seller was cloudtail so that was ok and i placed the order. Opened the packaging and carefully examined the box, showed no signs of tampering. The expiry date and batch number were printed on the bottom so that was a good sign. Product was made in Jan this year. Then i tried to scratch the authentication code but it was not coming off so i called the toll free number of glanbia. Gave them the batch number and got confirmation that its a genuine box. Then i realized that you can just remove the scratch sticker and see the number below it. Tracked it on authenticateon website and it was registered there so it was confirmed that its 100% genuine.Now about the taste, this is my 1st tasting ever and for a guy like me who isnt fussy about food/taste this is pretty decent. Not too sweet not too chocolatey.Mixability is great, no lumps or anything.Happy with the purchase.
flavour_name: Flavour Name: Double Rich ChocolateSize: 2 Lbs

review_text: So I watched a lot of YouTube videos regarding ON authenticity.My product did not have an importer tag also there was no blue expiry date on the bottom.So I called ON customer support and the agent mentioned below points-1. Glanbia (importer) now imports raw material from US and packaging is done in India. I guess the plant is in Himachal and established some 6 months back.2. There will be no importer tag in new ON boxes.3. Expiry date and batch number is now printed on back of the box in a white space with black ink and not on the bottom.4.No vaccum cover on the lid intead a pasted seal.5. Check authenticity by the TRU SEAL (which we all do).

review_text: After having the chocolate flavour for quite a few months, this vanilla didn't disappoint either. One must be careful while buying ON products as it has been the best selling for almost 9 years now, it has the most duplication too specifically in our country. Some quick notices that one can do is firstly check for the distributors sticker along with its hologram. Bright Commodities is one among the 3 distributors of ON products in our country. Original bottle always has a shiny surface and the date of manufacture and expiry are either at the bottom or at the neck in bright blue colour(mostly). And the supplier is always  Glanbia,  US.  Talking about the inside, the scoop should have a ON mark engraved on it. But most importantly is the powder. Original protein powders are very fine in nature, almost like the talcum powder. On the contrary, duplicate powders are comparatively fat grains. I hope this makes your buying easy
flavour_name: Flavour Name: Vanilla Ice CreamSize: 2 Lbs

review_text: Brand is famous and doesn't need any review however it is bit costly because of it's popularity.Take it but with safety.1. Never take more than necessary protein because excess protein can damage kidney. Yes we believe if we take extra, we will be stronger however it has side effects and shoud be consumed in safe limit.2. When you take protein you must drink minimum 3 litres of water. Again drinking excess water helps kidney to flush out excess urea and also excess unconsumed protein.3. When you don't excercise, don't take it. Many guys keep consuming it even after they don't go to gym or workout. Don't take it as a health nutrition.4. When you visit any gym, the gym trainer try to brainwash you to buy protein powder. Never listen to the gym guy because he gets commision to sell protein powder. If you really need, get one. Also don't buy the brand suggested by gym trainer. To get high commission they suggest you any other brand and they don't care about your health. They just care about their commision.Thanks for reading. Cheers!

review_text: This is a genuine product. There are many ways to check it. Let me tell you in detail.1. Check on the optimum Nutrition India site to find the registered distributors. You can find cloud tail there.2. You can check the authenticity of the code given on the pack by verifying on the above website. It takes the code only once, so the fake product manufacturers can't reuse.3. There is a seal on top of the pack. Overall quality of sticker and box good. So definately genuine.The taste is quite good. I had ordered vanilla icecream. I think it will be really awesome with milk.The expiry is quite soon, like aug 2021. review_text: I know ON is the best suppliment for whey protein in the market so I decided to order it online.I also knew the fact the there is huge issue regarding the authenticity of the product.I did some test to assure the veracity of the product.First of all I called ON customer care and enquired them about their authetic dealrrs in amazon.They listed names of some of their authentic dealers in amazon.I ordered from pne of them i.e Cloudtail India. Cloudtail India imports from Bright Comodities which is genuine distributor of ON products.I received my ON whey today and i scanned the QR code and to my expectation the vrowser opened up ON website which confirms its genuine.Still to confirm one last time I called their customer care and told them the batch number of my product and they told me about my product ,flavour ,quantity etc .They assured me its 100% genuine and can be consumend without any doubt.There is nothing ideal in this universe.SoI deducted 1 start because there is always a possibility of product improvement  and move closer and closer to perfection.

review_text: 1. On the containers lid there is one golden colour "ON Gold Standard" sticker which is sticked on to the black protection seal.2. There are two QR codes:i) "ON" Container QR Code-It is imprinted on the left hand side of the barcode, after scanning this QR code the official website of "ON" will be opened.ii) Disributors QR Code + Serial Number- The second QR code is of supplier in which there will be one QR code along with that a serial number  will be provided which is hidden under a silver sticker. Just scan this code and enter the details along with your serial number, this will show you whether your product is genuine or not.3. On the base of the container manufacturing and expiry date of the product is imprinted. On the website the date is printed in blue colour but the product which I have recieved has yellow colour printing.4. Mix the whey protein powder in water if it mixes properly then it's genuine and if there is residue with small lumps then it is fake.

review_text:
--------------------------------------UPDATE 11 March 2016---------------------------------------I keep an eye on my reviews but lately, I have seen this happening often . I get a few votes up for a review  and then quite strangely  a down vote the same day, that really has left me wondering if some people are deliberately down voting reviews. I don't understand how Amazon moderators are letting this off.---------------------------------------------I am compelled to write this review after seeing quite a few negative reviews calling it a fake or counterfeit which I find it quite misleading once again. I bought the 1lb pack to check the concerns raised that the packaging is mislabeled with a 23gram protein scoop. To all the concerned people, there is in fact 1lb Gold Standard refill pack with 24g protein per scoop. (Photos attached)
Optimum Nutrition (ON) 100% Whey Gold Standard - 2 lbs (Double Rich Chocolate)
is one of the best Whey proteins in the market today. Three things I liked about this product, the manufacturing is entirely done in the USA following strict US regulations, the grams of protein in each scoop and the taste.If you‚Äôre new to Protein Supplements, this is a quick overview of few major protein types that are sold in the market today.Most protein supplements that are in the market offer blends of different types of whey proteins. To make it easy, let me break it down for you. There are three types of fast digestive proteins, the cheapest is the Whey Concentrate typically a mass gainer with lots of carbs , then comes the more expensive Whey Isolate and then the most expensive Whey Hydro Isolate .Concentrate typically takes about 2-3 hours to digest, Isolates can be digested in your system within 2 hours, Hydro Isolates is purest form whey and can be taken even if you‚Äôre lactose intolerant - Hydro isolates can be digested within an hour and work best as Post Workout drinks. Basically, the price of your protein directly depends on the % of Whey Isolate or Whey Hydro Isolate present. There is also a slow digestive protein called Casein which is cheaper or almost the same as Whey Concentrate, treat this as a bedtime supplement as it takes about 6 hours to digest.What is OPTIMUM NUTRITION- 100% Whey Gold Standard ?ON 100% Whey Gold Standard is a multi-whey blend comprising isolates & concentrates as its main ingredients. It contains 24 grams of protein per serving, with a bit of fat, cholesterol, and lactose. Bear in mind, if you‚Äôre lactose intolerant, this is not for you unfortunately.Taste, Texture and MixabilityIt is not very sweet and mixes well with water and milk. I didn‚Äôt feel bloated and Double Chocolate flavour I‚Äôve tried was good, and I will give8.5/10 for the taste9.5/10 for mixabilityTotal score 9/10When will I start seeing results?This is the bitter truth, Protein supplements would help you <20% to reach your fitness goals. Your everyday workout helps you about another 30% and the rest is your daily diet as to how you maintain yourself eating healthy. You‚Äôre not going to get fitter staying home and just having 3 protein smoothies a day.From somewhere I had once read, you don‚Äôt buy protein protein supplements till you are regular at the gym working out and eating healthy for at least 90 days. Once those two habits are accomplished, buy protein supplements, and you will see results.Are protein supplements necessary?This question is debatable but it all comes down to how much protein is in your everyday diet. If you‚Äôve enough protein in your diet, no need obviously. From a personal perspective, I would avoid processed food like protein supplements any day, if I can consume enough protein through my diet (egg, milk, meat etc)Health Benefits/ IssuesIt is always advisable to take protein in their natural form (Milk, Egg, Meat, etc), but with a vegetarian diet that could be challenging. Rule of thumb with supplements is DO NOT go overboard - DO NOT take more than 2 scoops in 24 hours, but personally, if you‚Äôre not aiming for the Olympics, I suggest to start with 1 scoop a day so that you go easy on your body. In addition, you MUST drink a lot of water when taking protein supplements. From a lecture of Dr Tara Swart of MIT Sloan, your body requires 500ml of water for every 30lb (13.6 Kg) of your weight in a day to function normally.Smoothie recipe = 1 scoop (Chocolate) + 1 Avacado + Banana + 200ml Almond Milk + Ice Cubes in a Blender .PLEASE NOTE: Insufficient water intake can give you Stomach pain/ Abdominal Pain with protein supplements. NOT to be considered professional/medical advice. This review is based on personal experience. Protein supplements are to be considered with caution.
flavour_name: Flavour Name: Double Rich ChocolateSize: 2 Lbs

review_text: Title: Great Taste and High-Quality Protein Supplement!Rating: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êI recently purchased the Optimum Nutrition Brand Whey Protein in the delicious vanilla flavor, and I must say it has greatly exceeded my expectations! Here are some key points to consider:1. Taste: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êThe vanilla flavor is absolutely phenomenal! It has a smooth and creamy texture with a hint of natural vanilla taste. It's not overly sweet, making it perfect for those who prefer a more subtle flavor. Mixing it with water or milk creates a tasty and enjoyable protein shake.2. Quality: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êOptimum Nutrition is known for producing high-quality supplements, and this protein powder is no exception. It contains a blend of whey protein isolates, which are fast-acting and easily digestible. With each serving, you get a whopping 24 grams of protein, ensuring that your muscles receive the necessary fuel for growth and recovery.3. Mixability: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êOne of the things I love about this whey protein is how effortlessly it mixes with liquid. With just a few shakes in a shaker bottle or a quick stir with a spoon, there are no clumps or chunks left behind. This saves time and ensures a smooth and consistent texture, making it a breeze to consume.4. Versatility: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êAside from the traditional protein shake, this versatile powder can be used in various ways. I often add it to my morning oatmeal, smoothies, or even pancakes, enhancing their nutritional value while adding a delightful vanilla flavor. It's a great way to incorporate protein into different meals throughout the day.5. Value for Money: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êWhile the Optimum Nutrition brand may be slightly pricier than some other options on the market, the quality and taste justify the cost. Additionally, the product comes in various sizes, allowing you to choose the one that best suits your needs and budget.Overall, the Optimum Nutrition Brand Whey Protein in the vanilla flavor is a superior product that delivers on both taste and quality. If you're looking for a delicious and effective protein supplement, I highly recommend giving this one a try!

review_text: I am beginner in lifting and  have just started few months back. I am myself a health professional and initially, i was confused regarding the use of protein supplements because of all the myths about health issues associated with it. I went through so many studies about whey and decided to start consuming it. Trust me... whey protein is one of the best and fast digesting protein available, and provides a fuel that your muscles need after workout. You dont have to worry about what people and celebrities say about it like the one with ayushman khurana or akshay kumar. There is no harm in taking whey protein unless you are supposed to take low protein because of health issues like chronic kidney disease... well , in that case you cant lift heavy weights too as it migh lead to rhabdomyolisis. Well that‚Äôs different case.. Dont confuse it with drinks like horlicks protein that has high amount of carbohydrates and synthetic stuffs. Also people who thinks that such proteins are mixed with steroid... trust me, i am a doctor...it doesnt make sense. You dont consume steroids like that... there is a cycle... and anabolic steroids its a different thing. second doubt was regarding the authenticity... because there are some companies that provides less amount of protein content and usually has smp or skimmed milke protein instead of whey! Well it is easy to check the authenticity of the powder... it is written right there on the label of the container!Lastly, as a beginner you can use it, when u want to build muscle you need protein for building it as proteins are the building blocks.Secondly, it is not a steroid or takes 3 years for digestion as ayushman ji had said. And regarding what akshay kumar has told about whey protein, he is himself doing ads for horlicks protein which itself has lots of added stuffs and carbohydrates.Lastly, ON is one of the leading protein supplement available in India. Just dont forget to check the authenticity. The process is simple

review_text: The product is 100% FAKE because:1. First of all, there is no verification code on the bucket, as it must be there as advertised on Amazon's listing and photos. (Misleading advertising)2. There are no silver stickers on the lid. Usually there are two. On this bucket there isn't even a single one. (Malpalractice)3. Upon opening the seal, the inner packet was of poor quality, thin plastic, and most importantly IT WAS OPEN and its contents are leaked in the bucket. The packet is supposed to be sealed. (Tampered product)4. There is no batch number printed on the inner packet. The inner and outer batch numbers should match, but in this case, since the inner packet has obviously been replaced/tampered with, there is no batch number. (Contents replaced)5. The sticker on the bucker is blatantly low in quality is not even sticking to the bucket properly, its a travesty. (Non-genuine item)Please do not play with people's health likes this! Oh and, I want my money back.

review_text: Don‚Äôt ever buy ON products from Amazon. They are blended, often with harmful chemicals, which unfortunately I had to eventually find out. I ordered the cookies and cream flavor and what I got wasn‚Äôt cookies and cream. It was something very different. I have been using C&C for over 5 years and know the taste and look. I immediately tried to return it but was bogged down by plethora of red tape. Interestingly, every check indicated that the product was genuine( including the verification code) but after tasting it ( i had my doubts even before that just by the look- c&c has a white-ish color, my protein had a light brick-is color), it was apparent that it wasn‚Äôt genuine. Since the code returned to be genuine, I was unable to return this and get a refund. Against my best judgment ( and didn‚Äôt want to waste 7k) I started using this and after a week, i was feeling pain in my liver 30 mins after I took it. It was very apparent that it was due to the blended whey. I threw out the entire 5lb container. So if you value your life, don‚Äôt order from Amazon, order direct from glanbia or HealthKart as I have been, ever since and never had any issue.

review_text: Before ordering make sure that the product is not close to expiry. The product that I got was about to expire in 4 months. It was manufactured about 20 month's ago. I'm not sure if it was stored under correct condition to ensure its shelf life. As it is a health product, I couldn't use it and take risk with my health, therefore, I asked for return. Then I came to know Amazon consider a product close to expiration if it's expiry date is within 2 months. They refused the return to me. After arguing they agreed for the return but it left a bitter taste in my Amazon experience so far. The product has completed more than 85% of its life and they were not ready to return it.I suggest, unless the expiry date is mentioned in the description and you are comfortable with it, only then you order it. Don't get swayed by the 10 days return policy. Amazon can decide not to honour it.

review_text: I cannot comment definitively on the authenticity of the product yet (like how many people in the reviews are calling it fake) because it's just been a few days. But a thing of particular note is that I am unable to verify the authenticity using either of the two methods claimed by the brand.I scratched and sent the code by SMS on the number given (multiple times, using multiple different numbers) but did not receive a single text back. I also tried verifying online on the website given but never received the OTP to login. I don't know what's going on there but I certainly expected much better experience with a brand like ON. Even after a week, the product remains unverified.Another major concern is with the original packaging (not the amazon box, but ON's own packaging).First of all, there is no seal (after opening the lid) which is a standard industry practice to have. Why they have made without it, only they know (or is there a possibility that I received a counterfeit product?)Secondly, the outer seal (the thin plastic film ring on the lid itself) when taken apart, spilled a huge amount of product outside. A lot of whey protein powder must have been accumulated in between due to the lack of inner seal and during transportation. As you can see in the picture, this amount is pretty significant and also ruins your experience. Am I supposed to clean this up every time I open a jar of whey?As of flavour and mixability, they're both good. Nothing to complain about.Results? Too early to tell.Seriously considering giving ON a hard pass because of the issues mentioned earlier in the review. There are cheaper and better options available like Ultimate Nutrition Prostar. Might stick with it.
flavour_name: Flavour Name: Mocha CappuchinoSize: 5 Lbs

I've been using gold standard for over a year now.Has anyone else experienced this? Everything seems fine other than this tiny white matter spread in between all over. I don't know if it's fungus. review_text: Gimmicky advertising.It's a blend of whey and isolate; i got confused with the gimmicky advertisement of 'isolate primary source'.Otherwise ON is reliable and effective.However, this isn't suitable for someone who is lactose intolerant (like me). I don't expect to get bloating but if you feel a general degree of flatulence, then you too could potentially be lactose intolerant, in which case it's best to either use pure isolate (golden coloured label on container from ON) or use GNC Amp - which i found i could digest well.While it's still not the worst choice, it's not ideal if you are lactose intolerant.I found MyProtein & MuscleBlaze to not be good enough - isolate or vegan (pea protein, soy protein).
flavour_name: Flavour Name: Double Rich ChocolateSize: 8.8 Lbs

review_text: ON Gold is supposed to be one of the best whey product on the market. I may be so. I used myprotein for over a year, but wanted to try out something different. This discount deal came by. The protein may be doing what it is supposed to do. No bloating or any adverse reaction in the past month that I started this ON tub. The milkshake is thicker than I am used to. This is vanilla flavor. But there is definite artificial taste to it, slight bitterness. I don't think I will order vanilla again after I finish this 4kg tub.
flavour_name: Flavour Name: Vanilla Ice CreamSize: 8.8 Lbs

review_text: ON (Optimum Nutrition) Gold Standard Whey Protein Isolate is undoubtedly by far the best supplement going around. Well, considering the competitive Indian market the price is a lil on the higher side though. Having said that, if u can afford it, just go for it.Have been using the product for roughly 2 years now. Mostly bought from Amazon and I make it a point to select seller as Cloudtail India. I proudly claim, have never been disappointed. Always received original and authentic product and have suggested at least dozen of guys to buy it from Amazon.Like every other time I was excited to open my box of goodies. I was taken aback to see a duplicate product. Surprisingly enough the seller didn't even put enough effort to resemble it to the original packing. Guess what it doesn't even have the manufacturer, expiry date and batch number stamp (Refer picture to see how it looks like- stampis blue in color on the original one). I mean, come on the D-Kompany don't be so obvious.  The outside cover itself had such massive difference that didn't even have to open the packing.Please refer to the snaps attached.Left - OriginalRight - DuplicateThe million dollar question is how to identify, rather differentiate? Well, there are dozens of ways to recognize. Always look for the importer sticker (BRIGHT COMMODITIES) with QR code, fssai code, address and other stuff - see picture. The blue stamp, as aforementioned. See the pics and m sure it's a no brainer to come up with numerous differences.Hope it helps guys and wish everyone get their hands on an original one.

review_text: There are many fake supplements coming these days we have to be alert about all the supplements is there any body in India or Mumbai which can decide weather the supplement is pure and original like a governor body for the supplements in India weather its a Imported or Indian Brand.Unfortunately up to date, there is no regulatory or watchdog body which is in charge of regulating and managing the import, manufacture or distribution of supplements. They currently come under the Prevention of Food Adulterant n Act 1958 (PFA Act) which as you can see is an archaic act. The result has been a slew of unregulated, adulterated & fake supplements making their way into the Indian market over the past decade.Luckily in the offing and hopefully to come into effect next year is the all-new FSSA (Food Standards & Safety Act), currently FSSB Food Standards & safety Bill which was passed in Parliament. This Act finally recognizes "DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS" as a separate entity and is modeled on the lines of the DSHEA, CODEX and the EU Food Laws. Needless to say that it is a state-of-the-art ACT.
flavour_name: Flavour Name: Double Rich ChocolateSize: 8.8 Lbs

review_text: ON Gold Standard is priced slightly higher than other brands like Ultimate Nutrition, Muscleblaze etc for the almost the same protein content per serving.This is the best protein when it comes to taste, mixability quality and digestibility. I highly recommend that you try the Mocha Capuccino flavor. Also highly recommended is that you mix it with another base liquid and not just water. I use 200-250 ml milk and 500-550 ml water. Please do not use only water otherwise it will taste super weird. You can also add flavoring of your own like Unflavored yoghurt, peanut butter, Vanilla ice cream etc. Make sure you add something else with water and the additive doesn't overwhelm the capuccino's flavor. Most of the weird taste comments are because of this reason only.As for the product, it is genuine. Bright commodities is an authorized importer of ON Whey Protein. The QR code checks out. You're getting a much better deal on Amazon compared to Healthkart or PayTM etc and you get faster delivery. I got it in 24 hours.I used to have Ultimate Nutrition before. But this beats it in every department especially digestibility. UN was hard to digest, personally for me. I would have to go Number 2 , everytime I had a serving. No such complaints with ON.Tl;dr Great protein powder, highly recommended.
flavour_name: Flavour Name: Mocha CappuchinoSize: 5 Lbs

review_text: On Gold Standard 100% Whey protein is continuously winning awards from 11 years as the best isolate whey protein and i'm using it from 2 years the best ever whey protein with the best results you get. Well talking about the flavour that it has More than 18 different flavours than any other whey protein manufacturer has.For better results take it immediately after your workout and try to take minimum 2 to 3 scoops daily as i take 1 scoop one hour later  in morning after breakfast mixed with yoghurt and 1.5 scoop after workout in evening but keep in mind don't eat for 1 hour after consuming it let it get digested and then take your meals otherwise you are wasting your whey protein.Tips to find the product is genuine or not1. Lot Number : Every optimum nutrition product has a lot number which signifies that it belongs to the original ON product batch. This number can be found on the bottom of the jar.2. MFG and Expiry Date : Always check manufacturing date and expiry date. An expired product is of no use because it can give you serious side effects.3. Product Label : ON Gold Standard 100% Whey‚Äôs product label is printed with dark and vibrant colors with a shiny and smooth finish. You should check the label thoroughly, it should not look flimsy. It also lists 24g WPI, 5.5g BCAAs and 4g Glutamine. You should check that this info is correct on your label.4. Grammatical Errors : There is no room for grammatical errors on Optimum Nutrition‚Äôs product label. If you find any errors on the product label then it is fake.5. Check Seal : The container should be sealed properly from outside especially the lid is properly sealed if ON Gold 100 Whey is genuine. The seal is shiny and also the lead. Do not accept if there is no seal.6. Check Manufacturer‚Äôs Address : All ON products are mostly manufactured in the USA, so your Whey protein container should have the USA manufactures address. Check the back of the container.7. Scan The Bar Code : On the jar you will find a QR code and a bar code. Just scan these codes with your smartphone by using a QR code scanning app. It will show you product details. If the details come to be about ON Gold Standard 100% Whey then its genuine otherwise fake.#Flavours are rated above.ü§§Extereme milk chocolate  10/10üç´Double rich chocolate.  9/10üç´Chocolate mint  8/10üç´Vanila ice cream.  8/10üç®Rocky road.  7/10üò§Mocha cappuccino.  10/10‚òïÔ∏èBirthday cake. 7/10üéÇAlthough my favourite is mocha cappuccino and extreme milk chocolate but mostly i take mocha cappuccino Because it taste little bit like coffee and i take it in cold low fat milk that's why it taste like cold coffee.So guys i think you will find this helpful.üòòThis time the packaging was worse the jar was damaged but it is genuine. And yes This does not happen all the time. üòé

review_text: First of all. This is my first ON product purchase. I've purchased whey only once before and in this limited contrast I can say with certainty that the flavor is exactly like what you smell in a vial of vanilla flavor liquid. The intensity is not as much obviously which is a good thing. The best part of this specific flavor is to experiment with fruits, peanut butter and nuts.I received the tub which is exactly what I was hoping for. The scoop was not buried as the whey came in a soft-plastic bag within the tub and the scoop was just tagged alongside out of the soft-plastic in the tub. This is quite appreciative as it prevents wastage and is easy to scoop out of given the diameter of the cover.Honestly speaking, it is a bit expensive and not everybody is going to go for this as their first whey purchase, but the more experienced athletes this is a no-brainer if you have a knack to experiment in the kitchen.For the effects and potent review, I'm pretty sure the ON name is enough and I'm quite confident it won't disappoint if not exceed expectations.

review_text: I have been using Optimum Nutrition (ON) whey from more than an year now. It is really effective and must have protein for gym freaks who trains like beast in gym. It's a very important post workout supplement which acts as fast digestion and post workout recovery.I would like to mention, it's not that you had this and you'll see result, you have to workout, have proper diet to see results, but this gives you protein and other nutrition which helps in recovery and building muscles.I have tried Double Rich Chocolate, Coffee, Rocky Road and Mocha Cappuccino.Taste wise I personally liked Mocha Cappuccino and coffee as I am coffee lover, Double Rich Chocolate is also very good, less sweet as compared to others which is a plus point, Rocky Road tastes like bit of almonds.All four I have tried mixes well with water, I haven't tried with milk so cannot comment on it.I have been ordering from Primac Pecan Retail who is an authorized importer of ON here in India and I have never been dissatisfied, be it genuineity, delivery. It may be bit expensive than other sellers on Amazon but it's worth it.So workout hard, eat well and have your post workout whey and you'll start seeing results in 20 days.:) :) :)

review_text: Most nutritional aspects have already been covered by many reviewers, so I will be not writing about it. I will mention about how to check whether the product is original or duplicate.Once you receive the product, Please verify its properly sealed, seals are not tampered and product does not have any damage. Also, confirm that it has bright commodities logo with hologram because they are the original importers of the product by Optimum Nutrition Inc USA. Lastly, do call on the customer care of the Bright commodities mentioned on their sticker, they will ask few of your personal details and tell them you want to check legitimacy of the product. Then they are going to ask you the batch number, which is mentioned underneath of the box in blue color, once you give them that they will confirm you with MFD, Exp Date, Batch of production, and Product import code. If these details are matched product is genuine.Hope it helps you all. Have a good health and all the best for body building.

review_text: Please don't waste ur time n money on people/products like these. It's better to buy it from Market, no matter if it takes some extra money. Atleast you will get to buy a genuine product.When I received my order, it was leaking from top. When I weighed, it was 188 grams less than the real weight. Imagine a pack of 500 grams with less of 188 grams.2. I've ordered the same product in 5lbs earlier from a US website in same flavour. Now, the Indian one has a different taste altogether. Either it's the importer who is into duping the products or someone else under  the same tree. But its the customers who are at the loosing end.Decide for yourself wisely what u want to buy even after shelling so much amount out of ur pocket.A lot of replies questioned the authenticity of the product and there are numerous answers to them. But no one answers the 1 basic question...We all know that if someone wats to dupe the product, they would not tamper the plastic seal or the hologram. There are several other was to  replace the powder form with local substitutes.The easiest way is to cut the box/packet from the bottom and do whatever you want to... And then seal it back as generally people would check the top and not the bottom or sides.Even I got my packet re-sealed from bottom. Luckily, I ordered 1 pound packet and got saved. I would not suggest anyone to buy supplement online as they are non-returnable too.
flavour_name: Flavour Name: Double Rich ChocolateSize: 1 Lbs

review_text: As someone who has used all three popular brands of protein in India (muscleblaze whey concentrate, asitis whey isolate and now ON gold standard), i would like to give my honest opinion on this, when it comes to effect on body and workout, ON GOLD STANDARD>>>>MB concentrate>ASITIS isolate. The brand lives up to its name. Now the bad part comes, the artifical flavour and sweetners that leaves a lingering supersweet taste for hours in your mouth and throat, which makes it harmful for prolonged and excessive use. I wonder why such a big and famous brand never provided unflavoured, unsweetened option for people who don't want these things inside their body. It also puts question mark on the quality of whey processing plants that deal with these big brands in India. Will i repurchase this protein powder again? Not until they release an unflavoured version.
flavour_name: Flavour Name: Double Rich ChocolateSize: 1 Lbs

review_text: This was my first time ever with ON Protein Powder products. I have in the past tried its BCAA and Opti-Men series of multi vitamins and was very satisfied. But, when it comes to Protein powder supplements, I have stuck to Isopure for the past almost 13 years. I checked this product online and tried it. Here is my review:Likes# Pricing is much better. During good days, you can get it for about 1300 bucks for the 1lb packet# Protein percentage is very good. Almost 80% of the product mass.# Protein comes from Whey Protein Isolate (WPI) and not Whey Protein Concentrate (WPC). WPI is an ultra refined form of Whey Protein and contains far less carbohydrates and cholesterol. I consume only WPI# Added BCAA and Glutamine. This part was very attractive just like Isopure. I strongly recommend people to research the effects of BCAA and Glutamine and why they are important as supplements in your routine# The parent company is Glanbia. This is the same company that makes Isopure series of protein supplements. Their products can be trusted blindlyDislikes:# Even though it says Double Chocolate, the taste was not quite evident even after blending a scoopful in 200 mls of water# I once tried it in warm milk, trust me the experience was not good. The product almost curdled and formed cottage cheese (Paneer) like lumps and they did not taste good. I would have appreciated if they stated somewhere, that consuming it with warm milk/water is not advisableI think once this pouch is finished, I am going to switch back to Isopure protein products.
flavour_name: Flavour Name: Double Rich ChocolateSize: 1 Lbs

One thing you have to be careful is not to add boiling water directly to the powder. That makes the powder to coagulate and form clumps. I transferred the entire packet in to an air tight container. review_text: So here I am, a Gymfreak(In my mind) and a regular guy(on the outside), I feel obliged to write this review as, I hope someone would have done that before me so that I would have been spared of all the things that I went through.One of the best flavour after French Vanilla Creme(I have a thing for vanilla flavour, I have tried 8 of 14 flavours)CHECKLIST FOR FIRST TIMERS1.AUTHENTICITY Check for all the genuinity parameters of the product( you can find them on the website of ON), plus the importers' hologram sticker i.e either BRIGHT or NEULIFE and it's really important If you don't find it simply return it, don't even try to open it.2. FLAVOURS Its subjective when it comes to taste. It's an absolute plethora when it comes to flavours, the rule of thumb would be to go with the flavour of icecream you like. I like vanilla so my order of choice is french vanilla creme>Vanilla Ice Cream>cookie & cream> Extreme milk chocolate>Double rich chocolate>Chocolate Malt.I'm not advocating for these flavours but they have worked for me and it's possible that it won't for someone else. Strawberry and Rocky Road were one of the biggest mistakes.3. QUANTITY Don't just jump in and buy a big tub just because it was on sale, first try the small pack of that flavour once you are satisfied only then get the bigger pack. Some people might be thinking that why am I stressing so much about flavour, Its one of the tastiest things one gets to have after a long workout and if it doesn't taste good what good is life, I once stopped going to gym just so that I don't have to go through the torcher of drinking it daily( I'm serious).4. CONSUMPTION Don't binge on it just because it tastes good, stick to the body needs and the label in conformity with a good diet and exercise. HAPPY GYMMING :)

review_text: Gold standard was my first whey protein supplement and I ordered it on the basis of a friend's recommendation. I'm pleasantly surprised to see the results. As a supplement, ON Gold Standard delivers good results as is visible in my case. I've been working since 3 months now, and spend close to 2 hours in the gym everyday. For the 1st 1.5 months, I could hardly see any muscle definition or increase, nor could I see any visible progress in my strength; my lifts were stagnant and it was certainly demotivating. Come 1.5 months, I ordered the 2lb version and scooped up the entire thing in the matter of 18 days. I've ordered the 1lb pouch again after that. I'm happy to share that I've noticed and been complimented by friends and family members on gaining some muscle; it feels good after all the hard work. Plus, I've also seen a progressive increase in my overall strength and recovery time. Always order from Cloudtail, they are Amazon's most trusted seller and a part of Amazon just like WSR for Flipkart. My only gripe is that, I've felt a taste difference in the 1lb and 2lb pack with the 2lb pack being more sweet and more difficult to mix. Coming from the food industry, I frankly do not understand how the taste profile varies unless the manufacturer specifically uses different ingredients for for different SKUs. It is really sad if what I'm theorizing is true. Full marks for benefits though.
flavour_name: Flavour Name: Double Rich ChocolateSize: 1 Lbs

review_text: Original sealed packing for this orderPros:ON brandGood mixability, however, need to blend in mixeie or blenderHave tried various whey protein, so this is a good original powder.Cons:Too sweet. Wrote mail to company, they say sucralose is less than 2% of weight. But still too sweet.Sucralose is a problem with some people as it can cause rashes and itches.Packing is just okay. Need to transfer to air tight container.Conclusion:Good for your first whey.Overall, go for unflavoured concentrate or isolate. Add stevia liquid and some cocoa powder to tase.Do the maths.Unflavoured whey isloalate is Rs 2400 - Rs 300 per kg.Cocoa is Rs 200 - 400 per box.Stevia is Rs 150 for 20 ml. One drop is enough.So that combinations is better than this product.Also, always blend some fat source such as MCT oil, Almond oil, Coconut oil or milk cream with whey protein.This will spike the insulin less.In the end, follow a low-carb diet, have good proteins such as egg and whey and live a healthy life.For more on low-carb lifestyle, check Dlife forums.
